title: Marquise CAP SHAPE Hair Net
content:
This picture is taken from a Hair Net-package I found today in a second hand store. It is from the fifties and packed in England.   
   
 Any idea of what typeface is used?   
   
 ![Marquise CAP SHAPE Hair Net](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110142325im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/48976.jpg)
author: ubergraphika
